title: Unlock the Secrets to Thriving Rice Harvests!

subtasks: Check transplant timing (25-35 days after sowing)
Prepare paddy field (leveling, adding organic manure)
Choose manual or machine transplanting method
Space seedlings appropriately (20x20 cm for manual, follow machine guidelines)
Post-transplant care (flood field 7-10 days, monitor pests/weeds)
Monitor for pests and weeds after transplanting
Address pest and weed issues promptly
Flood paddy field for 7-10 days following transplanting
Like and share the guide on social media
Encourage fellow farmers to follow tips
